absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

bide.name: Bide
bide.description: User takes damage for two turns then strikes back double.

bind.name: Bind
bind.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

clamp.name: Clamp
clamp.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

constrict.name: Constrict
constrict.description: May lower opponent's Speed by one stage.

conversion.name: Conversion
conversion.description: Changes user's type to that of its first move.

counter.name: Counter
counter.description: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

dig.name: Dig
dig.description: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second. Can also escape from caves.

disable.name: Disable
disable.description: Opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns.

dream eater.name: Dream Eater
dream eater.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on a sleeping opponent.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig.

fire spin.name: Fire Spin
fire spin.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn.

growth.name: Growth
growth.description: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

gust.name: Gust
gust.description: Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

high jump kick.name: High Jump Kick
high jump kick.description: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

jump kick.name: Jump Kick
jump kick.description: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

leech life.name: Leech Life
leech life.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

leech seed.name: Leech Seed
leech seed.description: User steals HP from opponent each turn.

light screen.name: Light Screen
light screen.description: Halves damage from Special attacks for 5 turns.

low kick.name: Low Kick
low kick.description: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

mega drain.name: Mega Drain
mega drain.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.description: User performs any move in the game at random.

mirror move.name: Mirror Move
mirror move.description: User performs the opponent's last move.

mist.name: Mist
mist.description: User's stats cannot be changed for a period of time.

night shade.name: Night Shade
night shade.description: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

pay day.name: Pay Day
pay day.description: A small amount of money is gained after the battle resolves.

petal dance.name: Petal Dance
petal dance.description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

razor wind.name: Razor Wind
razor wind.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio.

recover.name: Recover
recover.description: User recovers half its max HP.

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.description: Halves damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns.

rest.name: Rest
rest.description: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

roar.name: Roar
roar.description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

seismic toss.name: Seismic Toss
seismic toss.description: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

skull bash.name: Skull Bash
skull bash.description: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second.

sky attack.name: Sky Attack
sky attack.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May cause flinching.

soft-boiled.name: Soft-Boiled
soft-boiled.description: User recovers half its max HP.

solar beam.name: Solar Beam
solar beam.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

struggle.name: Struggle
struggle.description: Only usable when all PP are gone. Hurts the user.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.description: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

super fang.name: Super Fang
super fang.description: Always takes off half of the opponent's HP.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Allows user to flee wild battles; also warps player to last PokéCenter.

thrash.name: Thrash
thrash.description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

transform.name: Transform
transform.description: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

tri attack.name: Tri Attack
tri attack.description: May paralyze, burn or freeze opponent.

twineedle.name: Twineedle
twineedle.description: Hits twice in one turn. May poison opponent.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

wrap.name: Wrap
wrap.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

ancient power.name: Ancient Power
ancient power.description: May raise all user's stats at once.

attract.name: Attract
attract.description: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

baton pass.name: Baton Pass
baton pass.description: User switches out and gives stat changes to the incoming Pokémon.

beat up.name: Beat Up
beat up.description: Each Pokémon in your party attacks.

belly drum.name: Belly Drum
belly drum.description: User loses 50% of its max HP, but Attack raises to maximum.

conversion 2.name: Conversion 2
conversion 2.description: User changes type to become resistant to opponent's last move.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

destiny bond.name: Destiny Bond
destiny bond.description: If the user faints, the opponent also faints.

detect.name: Detect
detect.description: Opponent's attack doesn't affect you, but may fail if used often.

encore.name: Encore
encore.description: Forces opponent to keep using its last move for 3 turns.

endure.name: Endure
endure.description: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used consecutively.

false swipe.name: False Swipe
false swipe.description: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

flail.name: Flail
flail.description: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

foresight.name: Foresight
foresight.description: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

giga drain.name: Giga Drain
giga drain.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

heal bell.name: Heal Bell
heal bell.description: Heals the user's party's status conditions.

hidden power.name: Hidden Power
hidden power.description: Type and power depends on user's IVs.

lock-on.name: Lock-On
lock-on.description: The next move the user uses is guaranteed to hit.

milk drink.name: Milk Drink
milk drink.description: User recovers half its max HP.

mind reader.name: Mind Reader
mind reader.description: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

mirror coat.name: Mirror Coat
mirror coat.description: When hit by a Special Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

morning sun.name: Morning Sun
morning sun.description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.description: The sleeping opponent loses 25% of its max HP each turn.

outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

pain split.name: Pain Split
pain split.description: The user's and opponent's HP becomes the average of both.

perish song.name: Perish Song
perish song.description: Any Pokémon in play when this attack is used faints in 3 turns.

protect.name: Protect
protect.description: User is not affected by opponent's move.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.description: Double power if the opponent is switching out.

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.description: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

rollout.name: Rollout
rollout.description: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.description: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

sketch.name: Sketch
sketch.description: Permanently copies the opponent's last move.

sleep talk.name: Sleep Talk
sleep talk.description: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

snore.name: Snore
snore.description: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.description: Hurts opponents when they switch into battle.

spite.name: Spite
spite.description: The opponent's last move loses 2-5 PP.

swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.description: Opponent becomes confused, but its Attack is raised two stages.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

triple kick.name: Triple Kick
triple kick.description: Hits thrice in one turn at increasing power.

twister.name: Twister
twister.description: May cause flinching. Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

vital throw.name: Vital Throw
vital throw.description: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

aromatherapy.name: Aromatherapy
aromatherapy.description: Cures all status problems in your party.

assist.name: Assist
assist.description: In a Double Battle, user randomly attacks with a partner's move.

blaze kick.name: Blaze Kick
blaze kick.description: High critical hit ratio. May burn opponent.

bounce.name: Bounce
bounce.description: Springs up on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

brick break.name: Brick Break
brick break.description: Breaks through Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

calm mind.name: Calm Mind
calm mind.description: Raises user's Special Attack and Special Defense.

camouflage.name: Camouflage
camouflage.description: Changes user's type according to the location.

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: Raises user's Special Defense and next Electric move's power increases.

cosmic power.name: Cosmic Power
cosmic power.description: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

covet.name: Covet
covet.description: Opponent's item is stolen by the user.

dive.name: Dive
dive.description: Dives underwater on first turn, attacks on second turn.

endeavor.name: Endeavor
endeavor.description: Reduces opponent's HP to same as user's.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.description: Stronger when the user's HP is higher.

facade.name: Facade
facade.description: Power doubles if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

fake out.name: Fake Out
fake out.description: User attacks first, foe flinches. Only usable on first turn.

flatter.name: Flatter
flatter.description: Confuses opponent, but raises its Special Attack by two stages.

focus punch.name: Focus Punch
focus punch.description: If the user is hit before attacking, it flinches instead.

follow me.name: Follow Me
follow me.description: In Double Battle, the user takes all the attacks.

grudge.name: Grudge
grudge.description: If the users faints after using this move, the PP for the opponent's last move is depleted.

hail.name: Hail
hail.description: Non-Ice types are damaged for 5 turns.

helping hand.name: Helping Hand
helping hand.description: In Double Battles, boosts the power of the partner's move.

ice ball.name: Ice Ball
ice ball.description: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

imprison.name: Imprison
imprison.description: Opponent is unable to use moves that the user also knows.

ingrain.name: Ingrain
ingrain.description: User restores HP each turn. User cannot escape/switch.

knock off.name: Knock Off
knock off.description: Removes opponent's held item for the rest of the battle.

magic coat.name: Magic Coat
magic coat.description: Any special move is reflected back to the attacker.

memento.name: Memento
memento.description: User faints, sharply lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

mud sport.name: Mud Sport
mud sport.description: Weakens the power of Electric-type moves.

nature power.name: Nature Power
nature power.description: Uses a certain move based on the current terrain.

odor sleuth.name: Odor Sleuth
odor sleuth.description: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

poison tail.name: Poison Tail
poison tail.description: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

recycle.name: Recycle
recycle.description: User's used hold item is restored.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.description: Power increases if user was hit first.

sand tomb.name: Sand Tomb
sand tomb.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

secret power.name: Secret Power
secret power.description: Effects of the attack vary with the location.

silver wind.name: Silver Wind
silver wind.description: May raise all stats of user at once.

skill swap.name: Skill Swap
skill swap.description: The user swaps Abilities with the opponent.

sky uppercut.name: Sky Uppercut
sky uppercut.description: Hits the opponent, even during Fly.

slack off.name: Slack Off
slack off.description: User recovers half its max HP.

smelling salts.name: Smelling Salts
smelling salts.description: Power doubles if opponent is paralyzed, but cures it.

snatch.name: Snatch
snatch.description: Steals the effects of the opponent's next move.

spit up.name: Spit Up
spit up.description: Power depends on how many times the user performed Stockpile.

stockpile.name: Stockpile
stockpile.description: Stores energy for use with Spit Up and Swallow.

swallow.name: Swallow
swallow.description: The more times the user has performed Stockpile, the more HP is recovered.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: Opponent can only use moves that attack.

torment.name: Torment
torment.description: Opponent cannot use the same move in a row.

trick.name: Trick
trick.description: Swaps held items with the opponent.

uproar.name: Uproar
uproar.description: User attacks for 3 turns and prevents sleep.

volt tackle.name: Volt Tackle
volt tackle.description: User receives recoil damage. May paralyze opponent.

water sport.name: Water Sport
water sport.description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

water spout.name: Water Spout
water spout.description: The higher the user's HP, the higher the damage caused.

weather ball.name: Weather Ball
weather ball.description: Move's power and type changes with the weather.

wish.name: Wish
wish.description: The user recovers HP in the following turn.

yawn.name: Yawn
yawn.description: Puts opponent to sleep in the next turn.
